mapper.update: update pay_earn_record set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, reverse = #{reverse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, amount, reverse, category_id, remark, pay_time, create_time, update_time from pay_earn_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
